root: ^We’re just one step away from taking down this corporation.
^I did my research before coming into this town and Eclipse is looking for a new partner to pair up with.
^You could try and get in close with them to bring them down.
^We need to expand our business if we want them to even consider us as partners.
^Let’s take out some loans and expand our business.
^Alright, let’s turn our business into a full car manufacturing one like Edison. This is sure to grab their attention.
